title: I have two email accounts, and now TB only downloads from one of them. It gets stuck on "checking"
content: Today Thunderbird only downloads new messages from my gmail, not my yahoo. It stops at "checking for new messages".
creator: arbrus

title: GUI message list too much space between lines
content: MIgrating from TB 48.5 to 102.15, i found the new GUI interesting but the spacing between lines in messages list is too wide for me. I'm already in compact mode. In 48.5 we had the add-on TB2 Classic but it's no more supported. Sorry but i'm an old man that is a bit nostalgic of the compact view we had with older versions add-ons.
creator: calypso777
